channel.title: Philr on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Philr on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Plotting a Sequential Binary Partition on a Tree in R
item.description: For users of PhILR (Paper, R Package), and also for users of the ILR transform that wan to make use of the awesome plotting functions in R. I wanted to share a function for plotting a sequential binary partition on a tree using the ggtree package. I recently wrote this for a manuscript but figured it might be of more general use to others as well. In its simplest form a sequential binary partition can be represented as a binary tree.
